locations.name: Route 24
exclude: Trade from Red/Blue which obtained it in Route 24.

guide: Play Pokémon Crystal and obtain all possible elements using only that game.
-A time-consuming task is obtaining Lucky Egg. The fastest way to obtain it is in Route 15 using Max Repel with a level 25 Pokémon leading the party.

-The other very time-consuming task is being infected by Pokérus. The fastest way to obtain to fight weak Pokémon using Struggle with x6 level 100 Blissey, and reviving them with Revive and Max Potion. By using Old Rod in Fuchsia City, it is possible to fight Lvl 10 Magikarp by only pressing Select and A repeatly.
Play Pokémon Gold until reaching Route 44 (which requires 7 badges) to catch Remoraid (which requires Good Rod, Remoraid swarm).
Play Pokémon Yellow until reaching Mewtwo.
Play Pokémon Stadium 1 until winning Round 1 and Round 2 for Normal Box and Gorgeus Box.

Play Pokémon Gold, Silver or Crystal until reaching Goldenrod City. Do this 8 times, one time for each possible bit combinaison in the 12th, 13th and 14th bit position of the trainer id. Perform Mystery Gift until obtaining all possible decorations. Trade the starters.
Obtain Mew and Celebi from events.
Check Generation II Version Compability Page

missables.text: SlowpokeTail becomes unavailable after exposing Team Rocket in Mahogany Town.
The 6th bit of your Trainer ID must be 1 to obtain Eon Mail instead of X Accuracy from Pokémon Stadium 2 Mystery Gift.
The 8th bit of your Trainer ID must be 0 to obtain MiracleBerry instead of Gold Berry from Pokémon Stadium 2 Mystery Gift.
The 14,13,12th bits of your Trainer ID must be 1,1,1 to obtain Scope Lens instead of other common items from Pokémon Stadium 2 Mystery Gift.
To own both GS Ball, Celebi at same time, you must get GS Ball from event but not use it. Then obtain Celebi with another event.
To own both Red Scale and Exp.Share at the same time, you must get Exp.Share from Lottery, and not trade Red Scale.

missables.text: Certain trainers can only be battled during the first voyage on S.S. Aqua.
Many Rocket Grunt battles are missable once the Team Rocket leaves the area.
